instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message:
no backlight, no image appear on screen. however external screen is working.

...like the macbook isn't detecting the screen.

i dont have a spare screen to test.

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message: Can a mod edit the title please. should be "820-3332".. thank you

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message: Asd os show 3 "mux switching" has failed. and sometime kernel panic when boot to desktop.

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message:
i've tried drag solder on U8900. problem still remain.

damn, just checked lcd cable. pin1 on its own is shorted to GND.  how difficult is it to replace the cable?

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message:
Do you get any symbol errors in ASD? Sometimes it can be a cap between the mux & LCD connector that got knocked off that causes no vide but from what you tell me of your screen cable, you need to try a new screen.. screen and cable both.

How did this come to be? Dropped, liquid, or out of the blue?

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message: Not liquid damage. Cant see any corrosion under microscope. Customor said "screen start flickering then suddently stop working"

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message:
Yes, its stange. I get random text lines appear before it tries to load ASD OS.


customer decide not to repair. new screen replacement cost too much.

..close thread.

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message: LCD cable can be changed in 5 minutes on a retina LCD!

threads.title: 820-3332 - internal display is not working, external is working.
threads.message:
duke

any tutorials. i think i need to practice on a broken screen before this procedure. there isnt one on youtube.

also can i use a 2014 15" on a 2012 for LCD testing?
